summary: A young girl is kidnapped by a serial killer. The serial killer uses manholes to kidnap and kill his victims. The young girl's older sister tries to save her before it's too late.
cast: Jung Kyung-Ho|Jung Yu-mi|Sae-ron Kim|Dal-hwan Jo|Duk-moon Choi|Yoon Jong-In|Young-yu Lee|Dong-Ryeok Sin
title: Maen-hol
